post.body: don't say that, I have a flight out on Xmas eve going home to CO - there I expect the cold! Yikes!
can't beleive our waiter at spider house just introduced himself as our man servant. LOL! just a beer please.
is so tired that she is dragging herslef out in to public with glasses and converse on. i look like a big dork! trudy's here i come!
has visions of sugarplums dancing in her head.
RT@kutaustin Holiday Music Special http://tinyurl.com/3n87sq - you gotta love Bing and Bowie! Now I am in the spirt! Thanks KUT!
is reading the nutritional facts on her box of caramel covered marshmallows and has decided to not eat the whole box right now.
is having the USPS hold my mail while I am gone for the holidays. Use this easy online form. https://holdmail.usps.com/duns/HoldMail.jsp
is jonesing for a BlackBerry Curve 8320 in Sapphire Blue http://tinyurl.com/4xvlat
can't believe my horoscope says I am supposed to expect a "surge of emotional tension" Not today my friend, I am 8 hours from vacation.
is 26 hours from 2 weeks of no work.
Has your child been Naughty or Nice this year? Give them a personalized call from the North Pole. http://www.northpolecalls.com/index.html
just realized she is one of the few in her building that actually bothered to come in to the office today. It's a ghost town here. Lonely :(
thinks SL is the BEST. Thanks for one of my all time favorite treats! http://tinyurl.com/4nwg3h Merry Christmas!
thinks the fog outside is as thick as the fog in her head today.
is ready for holiday wine and whine with the girls tonight!
just downloaded my free Jingle Bells ringtone...http://tinyurl.com/57f3o9
is going to pick up her new glasses. The current pair from 2003 aren't allowed to leave the house on my face. UGLY!
RT@InsideTexas Texas quarterback commit Garrett Gilbert is now ESPN's No. 1-ranked QB in the nation. http://tinyurl.com/5w2vbe
is having a hard time focusing this morning.
is wondering where this "wintery mix" is. Bring it!
is having a productive Friday evening taking care of the to-do list - what a very lame start to my 2009.
is wondering what the under/over was on the Cotton Bowl and if they are under or over.
is very excited about eating Shady Grove.
thinks everyone in Austin is walking around town lake right now. the trail is packed!
is going out to grab some lunch on this beautiful day! It is going to be almost 80 degrees today but right now it is 66.6 - a little scary!
is back to work and brushing the dust off of her laptop after almost 2 weeks off. What is my password again?
is spending her New Year's Eve traveling. What a fitting way to end 2008.
is wrapping up her last day in CO with, you guessed it, more food.
is thinking about new year's resolutions...perhaps I should stop eating all of this good home cooking.
is making a grocery list for what she needs to make her chicken enchiladas for dinner tonight for family and friends.
is watching her mom beat both clendon and i at bowling in the 8th frame. she has a 74. ugh
is relaxing this AM and trying to choose between going to see Slumdog Millionaire or bowling with the fam....
is drinking wine and enjoying the wonderful smell of banana bread my Mom just made baking in the oven. There is indeed no place like home!
is getting pizza at old chicago.
is getting her culture on at the Fine Arts Museum.
is out to buy New Moon - I read Twilight in 2 days.
is happy!
just filled up the growler at bristol brewing in COS. went with the kolsch this time.
is hoping she doesn't get a charlie in a box (or coal!) for xmas.
is in dallas and is not going to miss her connecting flight because it is the next gate over. must be my lucky day!
